Welcome to AI@UNM ðŸ§  # AI@UNM is a community of students seeking to deepen our understanding of the technical principles of AI and examine how AI should be fairly implemented in our society.
What We Do ðŸ‘¥ # Technical Track ðŸ”© # Technical Primers Primers for people new to the world of AI. We will go over the mathematical underpinnings and learn how AI systems are built and scaled.
Journal Club Keep up with current research with other motivated students
Workshops and Projects Participate in workshops to dive deeper in specialized topics, such as:
Mechanisitic Interpretability Applications in Science, Business, etc. Social Impact Track ðŸ“œ # Reading and discussion groups Papers, books, articles on AI ethics
Debates and case studies
How should universities handle AI in education? Should governments pause frontier AI development until safety measures catch up? Projects Write about AI use cases in your area of concern
Get Involved # Join our community of AI enthusiasts, researchers, and students!
Join Us
title: Welcome to AI@UNM
